text:
How Do You Think Technology Affects Dating?

Have you had any experience with dating? Have you ever used dating apps? If so, what has it been like for you? If not, why not?

How do you think technology — like apps, Netflix, social media and texting — affects dating and relationships? In your opinion, does it improve or worsen romantic interactions? How so?

It's also great for those who are too shy or nervous to approach the person in question. If you're having a hard time meeting the person of their dreams, dating apps are here to help. In a lot of cases, this makes it much easier to snag that special someone with much less work. 
You can also use technology as a way to get closer with your partner. It can be used as a way to stay in touch with your partner, without neglecting your own needs. This is especially helpful in today's busy world. As a conclusion, technology improves romantic interactions if used properly.
